text: Ba Đình Square (Vietnamese: Quảng Trường Ba Đình) is a square in the Vietnamese capital, Hà Nội. It is where Vietnamese President Hồ Chí Minh declared the independence of the Democratic Republic of Việt Nam from French imperialist rule on 2 September 1945, the same day that World War II ended. This is now where his mausoleum is. category:Hanoi Category:National squares Category:Town squares in Asia
title: Ba Ðình Square
